titles.title: A resolution recognizing the 100th anniversary of the National League of Cities and the support it provides to municipalities across the United States.
A resolution recognizing the 100th anniversary of the National League of Cities and the support it provides to municipalities across the United States.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the work of the National League of Cities over the last century and the role it will play in the next century in supporting the nation's municipalities with research, technical expertise, and advocacy.
